Package it.uniroma1.mdp.view

Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
it.uniroma1.mdp.view.AudioManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
EffectAudioManager, MusicAudioManager
public abstract class AudioManager extends Object
The AudioManager class handles the playback of audio files. It provides methods to load, play, and control audio files.
